name: Spider-Man
abilities: Wall-crawling, super strength, agility, and reflexes. Ability to shoot webs and a 'spider-sense' that warns of danger.

name: Iron Man
abilities: Genius-level intellect, powered armor granting flight, super strength, and an array of weapons and gadgets.

name: Captain America
abilities: Peak human strength, agility, and endurance. Master tactician and hand-to-hand combatant. Wields a vibranium shield.

name: Black Widow
abilities: Expert martial artist, espionage agent, and assassin. Exceptional agility, strength, and weapons proficiency.

name: Thor
abilities: Super strength, speed, durability, and the power to control lightning. Wields the enchanted hammer, Mjolnir.

name: Hulk
abilities: Superhuman strength, durability, and regenerative healing factor. Increases in strength as anger rises.

name: Doctor Strange
abilities: Mastery of the mystic arts, including spells, astral projection, and manipulation of magical energy.

name: Black Panther
abilities: Enhanced strength, speed, agility, and senses. Utilizes Vibranium suit and technology.
